授業目的:
初級レベルに要求される基本的な英語の機能と文法を導入することにより、簡単な会話と作
文を含む日常生活での英語の運用能力を養成することを目指す。

自然な英語で交わされる簡単な会話を理解し、日常生活での表現を使用できるようにする
ことによって、英語で基本的なことがらを相手と話すことができるようにする。
到達目標:
リスニングとスピーキングでは、ロールプレイ、調査、歌、ゲームを含むペアワークとグル
ープワーク等を重要な部分とする授業を通して、英語のネイティブスピーカーが用いるコミ
ュニケーション・ストラテジーについての基本を身につけている。
リスニングとスピーキングの養成に加えて、初級の英文作成のパターンに習熟すること
により、簡単かつ効果的な英文を書くことができるようになる。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This is a communication focused course, classes will be based on interactive communication using a combination of pair and group work, to help boost students English communication abilities and vocabulary knowledge.
授業方法:
全員出席をもとに、ロールプレイ、調査, ゲームを含むペアワークとグループワークは授業
の中では特に重要な部分となる。
Students will develop their English communication skills by performing learning activities and holding
discussions in pairs, groups of four and whole class groups.
Sessions will be conducted 'face to face.'

[Students with permission to study online]
On-demand A classes will be held using Microsoft Teams. Please see LUNA for a link to join.

第1回: Introduction, orientation, course details to be explained. Students will do introductory warm-up activities and ice-breakers.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 1 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第2回: Unit 1. Communicating: students will discuss various ways of communicating and how they use social media (Part 1).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 2 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第3回: Unit 1. Communicating: students will discuss various ways of communicating and how they use social media (Part 2).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 3 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第4回: Unit 2. Rules: students will learn about and compare rules and laws around the world and create their own classroom rules (Part 1).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 4 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第5回: Unit 2. Rules: students will learn about and compare rules and laws around the world and create their own classroom rules (Part 2).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 5 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第6回: Unit 3. Introductions: students will learn how to make friends and socialise using English (Part 1).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 2 and prepare for the mid-term speaking test (about 2 hours).
第7回: Review & mid-term speaking test. Students will talk about the topics covered so far using the English they have learned. Tests will be done in pairs.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 7 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第8回: Unit 3. Introductions: students will learn how to make friends and socialise using English (Part 2).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 8 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第9回: Unit 5. Past Events: students will discuss and discover important past events in their lives (Part 1).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 9 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第10回: Unit 5. Past Events: students will discuss and discover important past events in their lives (Part 2).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 10 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第11回: Unit 6. Education: students will learn about education in different countries and design their ideal school (Part 1).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 11 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第12回: Unit 6. Education: students will learn about education in different countries and design their ideal school (Part 2).
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 12 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第13回: Review & reflection: students will work in groups to reflect on the topics they studied this term and what they want to improve. They will prepare a short presentation for the class.
Prepare for the final speaking test (about 2 hours).
第14回: Review & final speaking test. Students will talk about the topics covered this semester using the English they have learned. Tests will be done in pairs.
Students will discuss final assessment and grading throughout the course
